document.title: Showing or hiding links and labels

list.item:
To toggle visibility of all client links, click Show/hide client-supplier links.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/16x16/diagram_supplier_link_icon.png

To toggle visibility of all inheritance links, click Show/hide inheritance links.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/16x16/diagram_inheritance_link_icon.png

To toggle visibility of all client link labels, click Show/hide labels.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/16x16/diagram_show_labels_icon.png
